Name: summary
Label: Incident description
Description: News summary written by The Trace staff.

Name: incident_type
Label: Descriptive labels
Description:
Less-lethal munitions: Immigration agent fired less lethal rounds (rubber bullets, etc.) at subject(s)
Shooting by immigration agent: Immigration agent discharged a firearm
Brandishing by immigration agent: Immigration agent pointed a firearm at subject(s)

Name: sources
Label: Source URLs
Description: News articles and other source material for the incident entry.

Name: civilians_killed
Label: Death count
Description: Number of civilians killed in incident.

Name: civilians_wounded
Label: Injury count
Description: Number of civilians injured but not killed in each incident.

Name: category
Label: Category tags
Description:
fatal: Subcategory of incident_type 'Shooting by immigration agent' with reported death(s)
injured: Subcategory of incident_type 'Shooting by immigration agent' with reported injuries
shooting: Subcategory of incident_type 'Shooting by immigration agent' with no reported deaths or injuries
lesslethal: Equivalent to incident_type 'Less-lethal munitions'
brandishing: Equivalent to incident_type 'Brandishing by immigration agent'

Name: off_duty
Label: Agent duty status
Description: Whether or not the immigration agent involved in the incident was off duty.
